title: Kate Beckinsale says she looks 'exactly' like Ryan Reynolds: We 'can't be in the same room'
text:
CLOSE Comedian Pete Davidson and British actress Kate Beckinsale were packing on the PDA at a New York Rangers game. USA TODAY

Wait, has Ryan Reynolds been Kate Beckinsale's twin this whole time? The British actress certainly thinks so.

While appearing on "The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon," the actress, 46, was adamant the "Deadpool" star is her superhero doppelganger.

"I look exactly like Ryan Reynolds," she said in the clip published Monday. "Like, in a shocking way."

According to Beckinsale, she's sometimes even confused his face for her own.

"Sometimes I see a bus going by with a poster, and I think, 'Damn, I look hot,' " she said. " 'Oh wait, it's not me. Also, I never did that movie. I've been at home.' "

Seeming skeptical, Fallon brought out side-by-side photos of the two actors to evaluate the resemblance.

"Do you see it?" Beckinsale asked. "It's weird, right?"

"I don't really see it," the host confessed.

Nevertheless, Beckinsale continued, saying she's "wrestled" with her resemblance to the 42-year-old Canadian actor for a while now.

More: Kate Beckinsale, 45, shows off toned figure in fire selfie

More: Kate Beckinsale fires back at Instagram troll who claimed she dresses 'like a teenager'

"I mean obviously he's not even, like, a slightly girly boy-bander type," she said. "He's, like, a big Canadian man, and I really see myself in him."

According to Beckinsale, she avoids interacting with Reynolds because they look so much alike.

"I can't be in the same room as him, because one of us would, I think, explode," she said. "Something would happen."

More: Ryan Reynolds jokes 'two thankless' kids who don't sleep are to blame for bags under eyes

Beckinsale added when past boyfriends of hers have met the star, they've felt, well, a little uncomfortable, to say the least.

"I have had boyfriends be in the same room as him when I wasn't there and feel really compromised. Like, way too intimate," she said. "They just feel like ... they sort of know things about his undercarriage that they shouldn't, but they don't."

description: Kate Beckinsale swears she looks "exactly like Ryan Reynolds" -- so much so that she "can't be in the same room" as the Canadian "Deadpool" star.
